segments.text: No , I'm Korean . Where are you from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm from America . Are you settling in all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've already found a flat and it's quite comfortable . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I live in my uncle's house . He came here ten years ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think of the local accent here ? Has it been causing you any problems ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it's just a matter of getting used to it .
segments.speaker: S1
